name: Ender (+Soundtrack!)
description:
Retro Bullet-Hell Space Opera Action!Developed by ANTSANDAPHIDS.NET GAMES

Ender: A Love Story (PC/Windows)

Engage Quantum Drives! Blast into the stratosphere and witness the melodrama and the mayhem of deep space shoot 'em up action! Take control of the finest pilot in the sector as she darts and weaves through the fabric of time. 

Ender is a blend of modern storytelling and retro arcade gameplay with a dash of bullet hell!

Your one and only true love has been captured by the forces of a shadowy, powerful government militia. Their demands are insane, their mission is reckless, their stakes are too high, but you have no choice...

Features:

-> Support for Xbox 360 Gamepad or keyboard controls!

-> A compelling narrative and interesting characters

-> Fast paced arcade style action with bullet hell influences

-> Original soundtrack

-> Modern retro styling and color

-> Story and music by Tylor Rose

*Includes complete four track soundtrack in .mp3 format!!

"I liked it. I think the color usage is superb, art is really good and there's a plot, which is always a plus. "

-Nsane

"Really liked the story and the way it was presented. The music was excellent. "

- IndieGameHunt
